Job role: AI/ML intern (Computer vision & geospatial intelligence) We are seeking a highly motivated AI/ML intern to help build a cutting-edge module for the automated digitization of power distribution infrastructure. You will work on transforming raw drone imagery into intelligent, GIS-mapped electrical networks. This role involves solving complex problems like asset detection in 'noisy' environments (urban/forest) and inferring logical electrical connectivity (topology) from visual data. 1. Object detection & segmentation: Develop and fine-tune models to identify poles, transformers, insulators, and conductors in high-resolution drone footage. 2. Network topology mapping: Implement algorithms (such as Graph Neural Networks) to predict connectivity between identified assets, ensuring the logical flow of the electrical grid. 3. Geospatial integration: Work with GIS data formats (Shapefiles, GeoJSON) to ensure detected assets are accurately mapped to real-world coordinates. 4. Robustness engineering: Optimize models to handle 'occlusions'- where trees or buildings hide wires- to maintain 95%+ accuracy. 5. Data pipeline management: Assist in preprocessing large-scale aerial datasets and implementing automated labeling workflows.

ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE CURRENTLY BASED IN JAIPUR. THIS IS A FULL-TIME, 3-MONTH WORK-FROM-OFFICE INTERNSHIP. We're ViralChilly A Jaipur-based digital marketing agency helping brands across the US, UK, Canada, and Australia grow through SEO, Paid Marketing, and Web Development. Trusted by clients like Canva, Adobe, Pharmeasy, Kalera Ayurveda, Stillio, Mobilocard, and many more. We're a young, execution-first team. No fluff. No excuses. Just real work, real learning, and good coffee over long meetings. Peek into our daily vibe Instagram About the Role We're looking for a Front-End Developer Intern who loves building interactive, responsive websites, translating designs into clean code, and creating smooth user experiences not just copying templates. This is not a "watch-and-learn" internship. You'll be coding web pages, implementing responsive layouts, integrating APIs, and supporting client projects in a fast-paced digital agency environment. You'll see how high-quality front-end development directly impacts user engagement and business results. What You'll Be Doing *Developing responsive and interactive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript *Implementing UI/UX designs into functional front-end interfaces *Collaborating with designers, developers, and marketers to build web projects *Optimizing front-end performance, load times, and accessibility *Debugging and fixing front-end issues or browser inconsistencies *Maintaining and updating existing websites and components *Suggesting improvements to enhance website usability, design, and interactivity (yes, your ideas matter) What You'll Learn (Training Provided) *How agencies build, maintain, and optimize front-end interfaces professionally *Best practices for responsive design, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript *Using front-end frameworks, libraries, and tools (React, Bootstrap, etc.) *Optimizing websites for performance, accessibility, and user experience *How strong front-end development drives engagement, conversions, and business growth (not textbook stuff) What We're Looking For *Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design *Familiarity with front-end frameworks/libraries is a bonus (React, Bootstrap, Tailwind, etc.) *Organized, proactive, and able to handle multiple web projects *Professional, reliable, and solution-oriented *Comfortable in a fast-paced, results-driven environment *Culture Fit Matters to Us *Confident & proactive (we won't micromanage you) *Coachable and open to feedback *Honest, professional, and clear communicator *Calm under deadlines & performance pressure *Team player with a positive attitude Preferred (But Not Mandatory) *Pursuing or completed BCA / B.Tech / MCA / Digital Marketing courses *Freshers or students serious about front-end development, web development, or UI/UX projects *Any exposure to front-end frameworks, responsive design, or API integration is a bonus Internship Details Type: Full-Time Internship Timings: 9:00 AM - 6:30 PM Days: Monday to Friday Location: Mansarovar, Jaipur (Onsite) Where We're Based Space 7, Sector 7, 4th Floor (Office 401), Shipra Path, Mansarovar, Jaipur - 302020 Right next to Suvira Hospital, in a modern building with an ICICI Bank branch. The area is buzzing D Mart, City Park, Woodland Park Apartments, and 50+ caf s & restaurants nearby. Perfect for coffee breaks & lunches. Why You'll Love Working at ViralChilly *5-Day Work Week - Weekends are yours *Team Lunches & Outings - Food + fun guaranteed *Unlimited Learning - You'll learn faster here than anywhere else *Real Front-End Development Exposure - Work on actual client websites and projects *High Ownership, Real Impact - Your code and designs drive user experience and client success *Fun, No-Ego Culture - Just smart people building cool things
